predicate.note: Frames file for 'reintegrate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, but 'integrate' is in 22.4.

example.name: adjectival, merged figure and ground
example.text: A reintegrated Europe implies big changes in 40-year-old military and economic policies.

example.name: everything separate
example.text: No marriage counselor could reintegrate John's new-found love for freedom with Mary's violent tendencies.
